channel.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
channel.description:
Around [s]6pm[/s] GMT i will be holding my 99 prayer party in Varrock Courtyard, world 106 (Free to Play).
Unfortunately it won't have any kind of drop party or similar as i am rendered flat broke after this venture.
SHOW UP OR I WILL TURM UR ASS
EDIT:
Delayed to 7PM GMT due to monetary issues and miscalculations @@@@@

item.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

nacional:

I would call it substantial evidence to be honest. Not saying that you absolutely did it but given that you offer to host a game from your home and provided the client and offered it to this community and that someone in said community gets hacked and from your IP, just seems too much. But w.e, but my post was mostly about the community’s “strange” reaction to it.

That is the very first thing I checked. Thug-life said it above this post, he didn’t post any clients at all, just links to clients hosted on official websites not owned or controlled by Speljohan.

This guy hasn’t PMed me yet with anything.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

The client wasn’t provided by Speljohan, it was links to other providers. They’re not owned by him.

Read full topic

I have played the game and have nearly 50 rares. Trust me, he would of hit me rather than this guy.

item.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:43, topic:390990”]lol at everyone jumping to help speljohan even with proof showing his ip, but when someone even barely mentions hacking/scamming someone everyone is a bleeding heart.[/quote]it isn’t substantial evidence whatsoever given the situation. What probably happened is that my laptop got RATed, meaning they can control it for their own purposes (in this case to use it as a proxy), or possibly using TOR, as i use that frequently (meaning, someone else can get my IP-address as a proxy). I intend to scan my laptop thoroughly tomorrow to check for any kind of malicious software.

Read full topic

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Tehlife:

Seriosly hes been hacking me, i can send u vid or something for more proof, see the ip match

I really doubt it Spel is hacking anyone. He’s trusted here and on many other sites.

My bet is someone from RSBOT is framing him since they all dislike him there, and he’s the perfect person to use.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:36, topic:390990”][quote author=Tehlife link=topic=486938.msg3571006#msg3571006 date=1303057543]

Don’t be stupid, if you keep getting hacked you should probably clean your computer. I trust Spelj0han, it’s more likely someone is using his computer somehow as a proxy (don’t forget he got hacked too) than he hacked you.

As for the download links, no one else is having a problem, why would it just be you? Specially as you aren’t really a well known member here…

Ive scanned my computer millions of times, ive downloaded 3 keylogger detectors and NONE of them tell me i have a problem
[/quote]

Don’t bother arguing about it on here, just PM me with all of the proof that you have. Also, I’d need to have an idea how he got your username/password in the first place.[/quote]Please do this. I want this matter sorted out, i do not like to have my name tainted like this. I know i am innocent, so do what you must about investigating.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’m pretty sure Speljohan is quite trustworthy.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
item.dc:creator: @Cbot Cbot
item.description:
@Cbot wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:35, topic:390990”][quote author=Cbot link=topic=486938.msg3571010#msg3571010 date=1303057698]
Yeah, I did pay for his 99 prayer. The fact is Spel lost a lot of money and I wanted to help him.
Just to prove that, these are just my winning from these past 2 weeks:
http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/7758/110417122409.png – My bank (most of it isn’t on this account)
Some stakes
http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/2447/110415212508.png
http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/9940/110415212903.png
http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/3218/110415213358.png

[/quote]Is staking seriously that good money? My friend said he got 100m yesterday but from greediness he ended up with 3m.[/quote]

You have to know a few things before you stake to make money.
The first day free trade came out I made max cash (lost it all to a glitcher but that part isn’t too important)
A general overview is the scams, how to look people up, how much to stake (I usually do 10% and after awhile 10% - 10m), and when your luck has turned around. You also can’t get too mad trying to stake; your rage will overcome you and cause you to just stake the first person you see (I get most of my money from kids who do this). If you know what to do you can make billions or get cleaned.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Prayer party!@@@
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Tehlife, post:29, topic:390990”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=486938.msg3570906#msg3570906 date=1303051496]
Yes, i totally hacked you! In all honesty, that IS my ip, but how it ended up there i have no clue. I have not posted anything malicious anywhere, nor do i have any intentions to do so.

Something similar to this actually happened a few years back when ruler accused me of being pplsuqbawlz. Somehow he had the same IP as me (it makes no sense whatsoever).

Sorry for your loss etc (what did you have anyway?), but i am not behind this. Cbot can vouch that the money used for 99 prayer was given to me by him (he’s a badass staker).
[/quote]
I lost around 100m, well all accounts together 100m. It’s sooo annoying. Everytime i log on an account in this computer it gets hacked under 10 minutes. When i posted this i just saw that my zerker pure got hacked[/quote]

Read full topic
